answer: All production databases in the EMEA region must use AES-256 encryption. Encryption keys must be rotated every 90 days. Database credentials must be stored in AWS Secrets Manager with automatic rotation enabled. Additionally, EMEA regions must comply with GDPR data residency requirements, ensuring all customer data is stored in eu-west-1 or eu-central-1, with data retention limited to 90 days unless explicit consent is obtained.
